SELECT A.SERVICENO , A.SERVICENAME , A.SERVICEDESC , A.SERVICECODE , A.SERVICECHANNEL , A.SERVICETYPE , A.SERVICEOWNER , A.SERVICESTEP , A.FILESEARCHKEY , (SELECT CODENAME FROM sys990020 WHERE CODEGRP = 'SERVICECODE' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.SERVICECODE) AS SERVICECODE_ , (SELECT CODENAME FROM sys990020 WHERE CODEGRP = 'SERVICECHANNEL' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.SERVICECHANNEL) AS SERVICECHANNEL_ , (SELECT CODENAME FROM sys990020 WHERE CODEGRP = 'SERVICETYPE' AND SITEID = 1 AND CODEVAL = A.SERVICETYPE) AS SERVICETYPE_ , CONVERT(nvarchar,A.RECEPTIONDATE, 23) AS RECEPTIONDATE_ , (SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE USERNO = A.SERVICEOWNER) AS SERVICEOWNER_ , (SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE USERNO = A.OWNER) AS OWNER_ , (SELECT CODENAME FROM sys990020 WHERE CODEGRP = 'SERVICESTEP' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.SERVICESTEP) AS SERVICESTEP_ , B.CUSTNAME, B.EMAIL, B.DUTY , B.HOMADDR1 + B.HOMADDR2 + B.HOMADDR3 AS CUSTADDRESS , B.MOBILE1 + '-' + B.MOBILE2 + '-' + B.MOBILE3 AS MOBILE , C.BSNO, C.CORP_SN AS INCNO , C.MOBILE1 + '-' + C.MOBILE2 + '-' + C.MOBILE3 AS CLIMOBILE , C.PRSDNAME, C.HOMEPAGE, C.CLINO, C.CLINAME
FROM sv300010 A LEFT OUTER JOIN cu100010 B ON B.CUSTNO = A.CUSTNO LEFT OUTER JOIN sa200010 C ON C.CLINO = A.CLINO WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.SERVICENO = #{serviceno}

SELECT CONVERT(nvarchar,A.VISITDATE,23) AS VISITDATE_ ,A.VISITTIME ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM sys990020 WHERE CODEGRP = 'REWARDTYPE' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.REWARDTYPE) AS REWARDTYPE_ ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM sys990020 WHERE CODEGRP = 'CAUSECODE' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.CAUSECODE) AS CAUSECODE_ ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM sys990020 WHERE CODEGRP = 'DELAYTYPE' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.DELAYTYPE) AS DELAYTYPE_ ,A.REWARDDESC ,A.DELAYDESC ,A.FILESEARCHKEY FROM sv300030 A WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.SERVICENO = #{serviceno}

SELECT CONVERT(nvarchar,A.RACTDATE,23) AS RACTDATE_ , (SELECT CODENAME FROM sys990020 WHERE CODEGRP = 'SENDYN' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.SENDYN) AS SENDYN_ , RACTDESC , FILESEARCHKEY FROM sv300040 A WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.SERVICENO = #{serviceno}

SELECT TOP 5 CONVERT(nvarchar,A.RACTDATE,23) AS RACTDATE_ , CASE WHEN A.RACTCODE = 1 THEN 'option1' WHEN A.RACTCODE = 2 THEN 'option2' WHEN A.RACTCODE = 3 THEN 'option3' END AS RACTCODE_ ,A.RACTDESC FROM sv300040 A WHERE A.SITEID = #{siteid} AND A.SERVICENO = #{serviceno}

SELECT A.CONVEYNO ,A.SERVICENO ,A.PREVOWNER ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE A.PREVOWNER = USERNO) AS PREVOWNER_ ,A.NEXTOWNER ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE A.NEXTOWNER = USERNO) AS NEXTOWNER_ ,(SELECT CODENAME FROM sys990020 WHERE CODEGRP = 'CONVEYREASON' AND SITEID = #{siteid} AND CODEVAL = A.CONVEYREASON) AS CONVEYREASON_ ,CONVERT(nvarchar,A.CONVEYDATE,23) AS CONVEYDATE ,A.CONVEYDESC FROM sv300050 A WHERE A.SERVICENO = #{serviceno} AND A.SITEID = #{siteid}
